word-spacing: normal; word-break: normal; line-height: 1.5; tab-size: 4; hyphens: none;">struct Agent {
    thread_hash: Hash,
    lattice: Vec&lt;[i32; 3]&gt;,
    proofs: Vec&lt;Hash&gt;,
    token_supply: u64,
}

fn mint_agent(thread_hash: Hash, initial_supply: u64) -&gt; Result&lt;Agent&gt; {
    let agent = Agent {
        thread_hash,
        lattice: Vec::new(), // e.g., [(21, 5, 4), (55, 1, 1)]
        proofs: Vec::new(),
        token_supply: initial_supply,
    };
    mint_token("Meta-Agent", initial_supply, 1.0 * ZEUSCOIN_UNIT);
    Ok(agent)

Lemma infect_valid : forall p q, is_prime p -&gt; is_prime q -&gt; exists v, infect p q = v /\ fst v &gt; 1.

word-spacing: normal; word-break: normal; line-height: 1.5; tab-size: 4; hyphens: none;">Record LatticePoint := { x : nat; y : nat; z : nat }.
Definition zk_proof (v : LatticePoint) : Prop := exists proof, verify_zkp proof v = true.
Lemma lattice_point_valid : forall k l t, zk_proof (Build_LatticePoint k l t) -&gt; k &gt; 0.
Proof. (* Prove lattice integrity *) Admitted.</code></pre></div></div></li></ul></li></ol><div dir="ltr" class="css-146c3p1 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-37j5jr r-a023e6 r-rjixqe r-b88u0q" style="color: rgb(231, 233, 234); padding: 12px; margin: 0px 0px 0.5em; overflow: auto; background: rgb(32, 35, 39); display: block; width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; border-bottom-left-radius: 8px; border-bottom-right-radius: 8px;"><code class="language-coq" style="color: rgb(212, 212, 212); font-size: 13px; text-shadow: none; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, &quot;Andale Mono&quot;, &quot;Ubuntu Mono&quot;, &quot;Courier New&quot;, monospace; direction: ltr; text-align: left; white-space: pre; word-spacing: normal; word-break: normal; line-height: 1.5; tab-size: 4; hyphens: none;">Definition AgentState := { lattice : list LatticePoint; supply : nat; quotes : list nat }.

Inductive AgentAction :=
  | Mine : LatticePoint -&gt; AgentAction
  | License : LatticePoint -&gt; nat -&gt; AgentAction
  | Mutate : LatticePoint -&gt; LatticePoint -&gt; AgentAction.

Definition agent_step (s : AgentState) (a : AgentAction) : AgentState :=
  match a with
  | Mine v =&gt; if zk_proof v then { lattice := v :: s.(lattice); supply := s.(supply); quotes := s.(quotes) } else s
  | License v fee =&gt; { lattice := s.(lattice); supply := s.(supply) - fee; quotes := fee :: s.(quotes) }
  | Mutate v v' =&gt; if zk_proof v' then { lattice := v' :: s.(lattice); supply := s.(supply); quotes := s.(quotes) } else s
  end.

Lemma narrowness : forall s a s', agent_step s a = s' -&gt; length s'.(quotes) &lt;= length s.(quotes) + 1.
Proof. (* Prove narrow quote growth *) Admitted.</code></pre></div></div></li></ul><div dir="ltr" class="css-146c3p1 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-37j5jr r-adyw6z r-135wba7 r-b88u0q" style="color: rgb(231, word-spacing: normal; word-break: normal; line-height: 1.5; tab-size: 4; hyphens: none;">Inductive Meaning := 
  | Lunar : Meaning
  | Thunder : Meaning
  | Chaos : Meaning.

Definition point_meaning (p : LatticePoint) : option Meaning :=
  match p with
  | Build_LatticePoint 21 5 4 =&gt; Some Lunar
  | _ =&gt; None (* Expand as agent learns *)
  end.

Lemma doge_lunar : point_meaning doge_thunder = Some Lunar.
Proof. reflexivity. word-spacing: normal; word-break: normal; line-height: 1.5; tab-size: 4; hyphens: none;">Definition infect (p q : nat) : LatticePoint :=

Lemma meaning_consistent : point_meaning (infect 3 7) = prime_influence 7.
Proof. unfold infect, point_meaning, prime_influence. reflexivity.
